November 15, 1961
Professor Jack Ellery
Chairman, Department of English,
Speech and Drama
East Tennessee State College
Johnson City, Tennessee
Dear Jack:
Bill Harley has asked for the reactions of the
Research Committee to an idea which he has had.
Since we were unable to have a committee meeting
in Washington with enough members present to obtain
a meaningful committee reaction, I am trying to get
a more complete reaction through the mails. A copy
of the relevant sections of Bill's letter is enclosed.
I would appreciate your candid reactions to the idea.
If you believe it to be a good one, any suggestions
which you have for implementation, I am sure, would
be appreciated both by Harley and by the next chairÂ¬
man of the research committee,
I hope that you will have an opportunity to respond
in the not-too-distant future.
Sincerely,
Samuel L. Becker
Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
